Comment: The insider said the network anxiety stemming from Trump's lawsuit and the pending merger "has everyone on pins and needles."  CBS News' parent company, Paramount Global, is currently in a legal battle against President Donald Trump, who filed a now-$20 billion lawsuit last year (it was initially $10 billion) alleging election interference over the network's handling of its "60 Minutes" interview with then-Vice President Kamala Harris.
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293
